creator: jiri.banszel@polarion.com
text:
From time to time we experience Apache server crash on Windows, probably due to #46845. 

That's why we configured Apache service to restart in case of failure (using tab Recovery on the service properties dialog). However this seems not to work for Apache service, Apache is still down after the crash. 

My guess is that Windows thinks that Apache crash is not a failure but shutdown, perhaps httpd returns 0 exit code in this situation?
